question: Which Sports have largest number of participants in teams of either side?
hints: Each team starts the match with 15 players on the field and seven or eight substitutes
The ball is oval in shape (technically a prolate spheroid), and is made up of four panels
aboutAnswer:
For Rugby Union, each team starts the match with 15 players on the field and seven or eight substitutes.
There are seven players in the water from each team at one time.
A baseball game is played between two teams, each composed of nine players.
In Football, each team consists of a maximum of eleven players (excluding substitutes).
